Package Monads

Class CounterContainer

java.lang.Object
Monads.CounterContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ItemCounterContainer
public class CounterContainer extends Object
this class represents a generic Counter container and contains some convince function to interact with them

  • Method Details

    • remove

      public void remove(Counter c)
      removes the counter at the given reference from our data
      Parameters:
      c - reference to the counter that we want to remove

    • testMap

      public Object testMap(Predicate<Object> testCriteria, ObjectMapInterface translator)
      generic test mapping of an array, takes a test criteria lambda and a translator function lambda returns null if an object in the array matching testCriteria is not found and the result of mapping the found object if it is found @param testCriteria the test criteria
      Parameters:
      testCriteria - lambda that takes an object within the data array and returns true if it matches a given criteria
      translator - maps the found value to a value that we want to return, used for attribute grabing and type conversion (a -> b)
      Returns:
      returns null if no object is found and the result of the translator([found object]) other wise

    • zeroData

      public void zeroData()
      zero out the counter container and reset the number of things stored in it
